function onSave()
     local state = {}
     state.SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID = SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID
     state.SelectedNationsGUID = SelectedNationsGUID
     state.SavedPositionsGUID = SavedPositionsGUID
     state.SoloGame = SoloGame
     state.BotColor = BotColor
     state.BotScoreType = BotScoreType
     state.RegisteredPlayers = RegisteredPlayers
     state.PlayerScores = PlayerScores
     return JSON.encode(state)
end

function onLoad(save_data)
    math.randomseed(os.time())

    CardLib = getObjectFromGUID('8a0e07').getTable('cardLib')
    ButtonBoard = getObjectFromGUID(ButtonBoardGUID)

    if save_data ~= "" then
        data = JSON.decode(save_data)
        SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID = data.SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID
        SelectedNationsGUID = data.SelectedNationsGUID
        SavedPositionsGUID = data.SavedPositionsGUID
        SoloGame = data.SoloGame
        BotColor = data.BotColor
        BotScoreType = data.BotScoreType
        RegisteredPlayers = data.RegisteredPlayers
        PlayerScores = data.PlayerScores
    end

    disableNonPlayersResourcePanel()
    refreshScoreTextUI()
    recreateButtonsOnMarketCards()
end

-- Renaming the power cards after flipping card
function onObjectRotate(obj, spin,  flip,  player_color,  old_spin,  old_flip)
     if flip == 0 then
          local sideA = obj.getVar('sideA')
          if sideA ~= nil then
               obj.setName(sideA)
          end
     elseif flip == 180 then
          local sideB = obj.getVar('sideB')
          if sideB ~= nil then
               obj.setName(sideB)
          end
     end
end

-- If there are enough players with selected nations, returns true
function playerNationSelectedSafetyCheck()
    local unreadyPlayers = {}
    local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

    if SoloGame then
      playerCount = 2
    end

    for _, player in ipairs(players) do
      -- Check to see if selected nation
      if SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID[player] == nil then
        table.insert(unreadyPlayers, player)

        local name = Player[player].steam_name
        if SoloGame and player == BotColor then
          name = "BOT"
          broadcastToAll("Please select a nation for the " .. BotColor .. " Bot.", Player[player].color)
        else
          if name == nil then
            name = player
          end
          broadcastToAll(name .. " needs to select a nation before the game can start.", Player[player].color)
        end
      end
    end

    return #players - #unreadyPlayers >= playerCount
end

function setupClassic(obj, player)
     if not RegisteredPlayers[player] then
          broadcastToColor('Please take a seat first before setting up the game.', player)
          return
     end

    cardSetGUID = classicSetGUID
    for _, deckGuid in pairs(legendSetGUID) do
        deck = getObjectFromGUID(deckGuid)
        getObjectFromGUID(TrashId).putObject(deck)
    end

    playerCountMenu()
end

function setupImperium(obj, player)
     if not RegisteredPlayers[player] then
          broadcastToColor('Please take a seat first before setting up the game.', player)
          return
     end

    cardSetGUID = legendSetGUID
    for _, deckGuid in pairs(classicSetGUID) do
        deck = getObjectFromGUID(deckGuid)
        getObjectFromGUID(TrashId).putObject(deck)
    end

    playerCountMenu()
end

function setupMix(obj, player)
     if not RegisteredPlayers[player] then
          broadcastToColor('Please take a seat first before setting up the game.', player)
          return
     end

    cardSetGUID = {}

    for i, deckGuid in pairs(classicSetGUID) do
        if math.random(1,2) == 1 then
            table.insert(cardSetGUID, classicSetGUID[i])
            deck = getObjectFromGUID(legendSetGUID[i])
            getObjectFromGUID(TrashId).putObject(deck)
        else
            table.insert(cardSetGUID, legendSetGUID[i])
            deck = getObjectFromGUID(classicSetGUID[i])
            getObjectFromGUID(TrashId).putObject(deck)
        end
    end

    playerCountMenu()
end

function startGameClick()
    if SoloGame then
        if playerNationSelectedSafetyCheck() then
          playerCount = 2
          dealCount = 6
          startLuaCoroutine(self, "setupCo")
        end
    else
        -- determine player count
        playerCount = #getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
        if playerNationSelectedSafetyCheck() then
            if playerCount <= 2 then
                playerCount = 2 -- might be 1 if started by solo player
                dealCount = 6
            elseif playerCount == 3 then
                dealCount = 7
            else
                dealCount = 8
            end
            startLuaCoroutine(self, "setupCo")
        end
    end
end

function removeCardFromDeck(deckGuid, cardGuid)
  local deck = getObjectFromGUID(deckGuid)
  if deck ~= nil then
    local trashBag = getObjectFromGUID(TrashId)
    local params = ({
      guid = cardGuid,
      position = trashBag.getPosition()
    })

    trashBag.putObject(deck.takeObject(params))
  end
end

function removeNationTributaryCardFromDeck(powerCardGuid)
  local targetGuids = RemoveTributarySetupGUID['_' .. powerCardGuid]
  if targetGuids then
    removeCardFromDeck(targetGuids[1], targetGuids[2])
  end
end

function removeSelectedNationFromTributaries()
  for _, player in ipairs(Players) do
    local zone = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerRegionsGUID[player].power)
    for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
      if obj.type == 'Card' then
        removeNationTributaryCardFromDeck(obj.guid)
      elseif obj.type == 'Deck' then
        for _, card in ipairs(obj.getObjects()) do
          removeNationTributaryCardFromDeck(card.guid)
        end
      end
    end
  end
end

function removeUnselectedNations()
  for _, guid in ipairs(NationPowerCardsGUID) do
    if SelectedNationsGUID["_" .. guid] == nil then
      removeNation(guid)
    end
  end
end

-- guid is the nation's power card
function removeNation(guid)
  local trashBag = getObjectFromGUID(TrashId)
  local card = getObjectFromGUID(guid)

  if card == nil then
    broadcastToAll("Can't remove nation with GUID:" .. guid .. ". Object not found.", {1, 0, 0})
    return
  end

  local cardSet = card.getVar('CardSet')
  for _, v in pairs(cardSet) do
    if type(v) == 'table' then
      for _, w in ipairs(v) do
        trashBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(w))
      end
    else
      trashBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(v))
    end
  end
end

function getNonPlayers()
     local nonPlayers = {}
     for _, player in ipairs(Players) do
          if RegisteredPlayers[player] == nil then
               nonPlayers[#nonPlayers + 1] = player
          end
     end

     return nonPlayers
end

function removeNonPlayers()
     local nonPlayers = getNonPlayers()
     -- Remove unwanted players' playing regions
     for _, player in ipairs(nonPlayers) do
          attemptDestroy(PlayerBoardsGUID[player])
          for _, textGuid in ipairs(RemovableTextGUID[player]) do
               attemptDestroy(textGuid)
          end
          local btn = getObjectFromGUID(RecallButtonsGUID[player])
          for _, exhaustGuid in ipairs(btn.getVar('exhaustGUID')) do
               attemptDestroy(exhaustGuid)
          end
          for _, actionGuid in ipairs(btn.getVar('actionGUID')) do
               attemptDestroy(actionGuid)
          end
          attemptDestroy(btn.getVar('stateCardGUID'))
          btn.destroy()

          attemptDestroy(PlayerTokensGUID[player].population)
          attemptDestroy(PlayerTokensGUID[player].materials)
          attemptDestroy(PlayerTokensGUID[player].progress)

          attemptDestroy(ReshuffleButtonsGUID[player])
     end
end

function disableNonPlayersResourcePanel()
     local nonPlayers = getNonPlayers()
     for _, player in ipairs(nonPlayers) do
          UI.setAttribute(player..'ResourcePanel', 'active', '0')
     end
end

function attemptDestroy(guid)
     local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
     if obj ~= nil then obj.destroy() end
end

         RegisteredPlayers[color] = 1

                    }

                end
            end

            local progressTokenBag = getObjectFromGUID(ProgressTokenBagGUID)
            for _, object in ipairs(zoneObjects) do
               if object.type == 'Card' then
                    local name = object.getName()
                    local desc = object.getDescription()
                    local key = name
                    if desc ~= '' then
                         key = key .. ' ' .. desc
                    end
                    local data = CardLib[key]
                    if data and data.tags and data.tags['Civilized'] and not data.tags['Uncivilized'] then
                         local pos = object.getPosition()
                         pos[2] = pos[2] + 0.5
                         progressTokenBag.takeObject({
                         position = pos,
                         rotation = {0, 180, 0}
                         })
                    end
               end
            end
        end
    end

    if SoloGame then
      -- setup solo tokens
      local soloBag = getObjectFromGUID(soloBagGUID)
      for i = 1, #soloTokensGUID do
        local obj = soloBag.takeObject({
          guid = soloTokensGUID[i],
          position = posSoloTokens[i],
          rotation = {0, 180, 0}
        })

        if i > 1 then
             obj.setLock(true)
        end
      end

      soloBag.takeObject({
        guid = 'e43770',
        rotation = {0, 180, 0}
   }).setPositionSmooth({-36.50, 1.5, 25.00}, false, true)
    end

    if SoloGame then
      broadcastToAll("The rest of the Bot will need to be setup manually.")
      w(3)
      broadcastToAll("Good luck and have fun!")
    else
      local seatedPlayers = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
      local firstPlayerIndex = math.random(1, #seatedPlayers)
      local firstPlayerColor = seatedPlayers[firstPlayerIndex]
      local firstPlayer = Player[firstPlayerColor]
      local playerName = firstPlayer.steam_name
      if playerName == nil then
           playerName = firstPlayerColor
      end
      broadcastToAll("The first player will be " .. playerName ..".", firstPlayer.color)
      -- Place solstice card in player's hand
      getObjectFromGUID('42ddc1').deal(1, firstPlayerColor)

      w(1.5)

      Turns.turn_color = firstPlayerColor
      Turns.enable = true
    end

    return 1
end

function setupUnrestSupply()
     local unrestZone = getObjectFromGUID(UnrestZoneGUID)
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     local unrestPlaced = false

     for _, player in ipairs(players) do
          for _, obj in ipairs(getObjectFromGUID(PlayerRegionsGUID[player].deck).getObjects()) do
               if obj.type == 'Deck' and obj.getDescription() == '(Supply)' then
                    getObjectFromGUID(UnrestPileGUID).putObject(obj)
                    unrestPlaced = true
               end
          end
     end

     return unrestPlaced
end

function makeItSnappy()
    snapsBoard = {}
    snapX = -75 --0.33
    snapY = 10 -- -0.911 -- -0.966
    snapSpaceX = 5 -- -0.077
    snapSpaceY = -1.2 -- 0.11

    for i=1, 30 do
        for y=1, 20 do
            table.insert(snapsBoard, {
                position = {snapX+snapSpaceX*i, 1, snapY+snapSpaceY*y},
                rotation = {0, 180, 0},
                rotation_snap = true,
                })
        end
    end

    Global.setSnapPoints(snapsBoard)
end


function w(some)
    local Time = os.clock() + some
    while os.clock() < Time do
        coroutine.yield(0)
    end
end

function calculateFinalScore()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "calculateFinalScoreCo")
end

function calculateFinalScoreCo()
     broadcastToAll("Calculating score...")

     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     calculateScore(true)

     -- Display score for each player
     local i = 0
     local notes = '[u]**Score**[/u]\n\n'
     local sortedScore = {}
     for k, v in pairs(PlayerScores) do
          table.insert(sortedScore, {color = k, score = v})
     end

     table.sort(sortedScore, function(a, b) return a.score > b.score end)

     broadcastToAll("** Results **", {1, 1, 1})
     for k, v in pairs(sortedScore) do
          local lblPlayerName = Player[v.color].steam_name
          local color = Color[Player[v.color].color]:toHex()

          if lblPlayerName == nil then
               if v.color == BotColor then
                    lblPlayerName = 'BOT'
               else
                    lblPlayerName = v.color
               end
          end

          notes = notes .. '[' .. color .. ']' .. lblPlayerName .. "'s score: " .. v.score .. " VP\n"

          broadcastToAll(lblPlayerName .. "'s score: " .. v.score .. " VP", Player[v.color].color)
          i = i + 1
     end

     notes = notes .. '\n\n[FFFFFF][i]*Check your Notebook for Score Results.[/i]'
     Notes.setNotes(notes)
     refreshScoreTextUI()

     notebookScoreDetails()
     return 1
end

function notebookScoreDetails()
     local tabs = Notes.getNotebookTabs()
     local seatedPlayers = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     for _, player in ipairs(seatedPlayers) do
          if PlayerScoreDetails[player] then
               -- Get player's note tab. If one doesn't exist, create a new one
               local tabIndex = -1
               for _, tab in ipairs(tabs) do
                    if tab.color == player then
                         tabIndex = tab.index
                         break
                    end
               end
               if tabIndex == -1 then
                    return
                    -- Code below is bugged in TTS
                    --tabIndex = Notes.addNotebookTab({title = player, body = "", color = player})
               end

               local text = ""
               for _, v in ipairs(PlayerScoreDetails[player]['etc']) do
                    text = text .. v .. '\n'
               end

               text = text .. '\n[u]   X VP   [/u]\n'
               if #PlayerScoreDetails[player]['X VP'] > 0 then
                    for _, v in ipairs(PlayerScoreDetails[player]['X VP']) do
                         text = text .. v .. '\n'
                    end
               else
                    text = text .. 'None\n'
               end

               text = text .. '\n[u]   ? VP   [/u]\n'
               if #PlayerScoreDetails[player]['? VP'] > 0 then
                    for _, v in ipairs(PlayerScoreDetails[player]['? VP']) do
                         text = text .. v .. '\n'
                    end
               else
                    text = text .. 'None\n'
               end

               text = text .. '\n[u]   * VP   [/u]\n'
               if #PlayerScoreDetails[player]['* VP'] > 0 then
                    for _,v in ipairs(PlayerScoreDetails[player]['* VP']) do
                         text = text .. v .. '\n'
                    end
               else
                    text = text .. 'None\n'
               end

               Notes.editNotebookTab({
                    index = tabIndex,
                    body = text,
                    title = 'Score Results'
               })
          end
     end
end

function calculateScore(logDetails)
     local logDetails = logDetails or false
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     PlayerScores = {}
     PlayerScoreDetails = {}

     countAllCardTags()

     -- Calculate the final score for all players
     for _, playerColor in ipairs(players) do
          PlayerScoreDetails[playerColor] = {}
          PlayerScores[playerColor], PlayerScoreDetails[playerColor] = calculatePlayerScore(playerColor, logDetails)
     end
end

function getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     local seatedPlayers = getSeatedPlayers()
     local result = {}

     if DEBUG then
          return {Players[1], Players[2], Players[3]}
     end

     for _, seatedPlayer in ipairs(seatedPlayers) do
          for _, player in ipairs(Players) do
               if seatedPlayer == player and RegisteredPlayers[seatedPlayer] ~= nil then
                    table.insert(result, player)
               break
          end
     end
     end

     if SoloGame then
          table.insert(result, BotColor)
     end

     return result
end

function getIfInHistory(player, objGUID)
     local zone = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerRegionsGUID[player].history)
     for _, obj in zone.getObjects() do
          if obj.getGUID() == objGUID then
               return true
          end

          if obj.type == 'Deck' then
               for _, card in obj.getObjects() do
                    if card.getGUID() == objGUID then
                         return true;
                    end
               end
          end
     end

     return false
end

function getIfGarrisoned(player, obj, cardGuid)
     if not getIfInPlayZone(player, obj) then
          return false
     end

     -- Handle special case scenario if the card in question might be in a container
     if obj.type == 'Deck' and not obj.is_face_down then
          local cards = obj.getObjects()
          if cards[#cards].guid ~= cardGuid then
               return true
          end
     end

     local castPos = obj.getPosition()
     castPos[2] = castPos[2] + 0.03
     local hits = Physics.cast({
          origin        = castPos,
          direction     = {0, 1, 0},
          type          = 1,
          max_distance  = 0.5,
     })

     for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
          if hit.hit_object.guid ~= obj.guid then -- ignore collision with self
               return true
          end
     end

     return false
end

function getIfInPlayZone(player, obj)
     local zones = obj.getZones()
     for _, zone in pairs(zones) do
          if zone.guid == PlayerRegionsGUID[player].inPlay then
               return true
          end
     end

     return false
end

-- Count the card tags for all players
function countAllCardTags()
     players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     -- First need to do a count of all the card categories since some cards will rely on what other players have
     for _, playerColor in ipairs(players) do
          PlayerTagValues[playerColor] = {}
          PlayerInPlayTagValues[playerColor] = {}

          -- init empty table
          for k,v in pairs(CountableTags) do
               PlayerTagValues[playerColor][k] = 0
          end
          for  k,v in pairs(CountableInPlayTags) do
               PlayerInPlayTagValues[playerColor][k] = 0
          end

          for _, zoneGUID in pairs(PlayerRegionsGUID[playerColor]) do
               countCardTagsAtZone(playerColor, getObjectFromGUID(zoneGUID))
          end

          -- Add resource count into the tags
          PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Materials = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerTokensGUID[playerColor].materials).getVar('count')
          PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Population = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerTokensGUID[playerColor].population).getVar('count')
          PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Progress = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerTokensGUID[playerColor].progress).getVar('count')

          PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Unrest = math.max(0, PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Unrest)
     end
end

function countCardTagsAtZone(player, zone)
     local inPlayZone = zone.guid == PlayerRegionsGUID[player].inPlay

     for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' then
               local inPlay = inPlayZone and not getIfGarrisoned(player, obj, obj.getGUID())
               local status, err = pcall(countTags, player, obj.getName(), obj.getDescription(), inPlay)
               if not status then
                    local msg = 'Error counting tags for card "' .. obj.getName() .. '" for ' .. player
                    broadcastToAll(msg, {1,0,0})
                    broadcastToAll(err)
               end
          elseif obj.type == 'Deck' then
               for _, card in ipairs(obj.getObjects()) do
                    local inPlay = inPlayZone and not getIfGarrisoned(player, obj, card.guid)
                    local status, err = pcall(countTags, player, card.name, card.description, inPlay)
                    if not status then
                         local msg = 'Error counting tags for card "' .. card.name .. '" for ' .. player
                         broadcastToAll(msg, {1,0,0})
                         broadcastToAll(err)
                    end
               end
          end
     end
end

function countTags(player, name, desc, inPlay)
     PlayerTagValues[player].Cards = PlayerTagValues[player].Cards + 1

     local key = ''
     if desc ~= '' then
          key = name .. ' ' .. desc
     else
          key = name
     end

     local data = CardLib[key]
     if data == nil then
          if DEBUG then
               log(player .. ': "' .. key .. '" not found in card library.')
          end
          return 0
     end

     for k,v in pairs(data.tags) do
          if CountableTags[k] ~= nil then
               PlayerTagValues[player][k] = PlayerTagValues[player][k] + v
          end
          if inPlay and CountableInPlayTags[k] ~= nil then
               PlayerInPlayTagValues[player][k] = PlayerInPlayTagValues[player][k] + v
          end
     end

     if inPlay and data.tags['Region'] == nil and data.tags['Pinned'] ~= nil then
          PlayerInPlayTagValues[player]['Pinned Not Region'] = PlayerInPlayTagValues[player]['Pinned Not Region'] + 1
     end

     if name == 'Sumerians' then
          PlayerTagValues[player].Unrest = PlayerTagValues[player].Unrest - 2
     end

     return 1
end

function calculatePlayerScore(player, logDetails)
     local logDetails = logDetails or false
     local score = 0
     local scoreDetails
     if logDetails then
          scoreDetails = {}
          scoreDetails['etc'] = {}
          scoreDetails['X VP'] = {}
          scoreDetails['? VP'] = {}
          scoreDetails['* VP'] = {}
     end

     for _, zoneGUID in pairs(PlayerRegionsGUID[player]) do
          score = score + scoreCardsAtZone(player, getObjectFromGUID(zoneGUID), scoreDetails)
     end

     score = score + PlayerTagValues[player].Progress

     if SoloGame and player == BotColor then
          if BotScoreType == 1 then
               score = score + math.floor(PlayerTagValues[player].Materials / 10)
               score = score + math.floor(PlayerTagValues[player].Population / 10)
          elseif BotScoreType == 2 then
               score = score + math.floor(PlayerTagValues[player].Materials / 5)
               score = score + math.floor(PlayerTagValues[player].Population / 5)
          end
     end

     local unrestScore = PlayerTagValues[player].Unrest * -2
     score = score + unrestScore
     if logDetails then
          table.insert(scoreDetails['etc'], 'Progress: ' .. tostring(PlayerTagValues[player].Progress .. ' VP'))
          table.insert(scoreDetails['etc'], 'Unrest: ' .. tostring(unrestScore) .. ' VP')
     end

     return score, scoreDetails
end

function scoreCardsAtZone(player, zone, scoreDetails)
     local score = 0
     local inPlayZone = zone.guid == PlayerRegionsGUID[player].inPlay
     local inHistory = zone.guid == PlayerRegionsGUID[player].history
     for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' then
               local inGarrison = getIfGarrisoned(player, obj, obj.getGUID())
               local inPlay = inPlayZone and not inGarrison
               local status, result = pcall(scoreCard, player, obj, obj.getName(), obj.getDescription(), inPlay, inGarrison, inHistory)

               if status then
                    score = score + result
                    if scoreDetails then
                         logScoreDetails(obj.getName(), obj.getDescription(), result, scoreDetails)
                    end
               else
                    local msg = 'Error in scoring card "' .. obj.getName() .. '" (guid:' .. obj.getGUID() .. ') for ' .. player
                    broadcastToAll(msg, {1,0,0})
                    broadcastToAll(result)
               end

          elseif obj.type == 'Deck' then
               for _, card in ipairs(obj.getObjects()) do
                    local inGarrison = getIfGarrisoned(player, obj, card.guid)
                    local inPlay = inPlayZone and not isGarrison
                    local status, result = pcall(scoreCard, player, obj, card.name, card.description, inPlay, inGarrison, inHistory)

                    if status then
                         score = score + result
                         if scoreDetails then
                              logScoreDetails(card.name, card.description, result, scoreDetails)
                         end
                    else
                         local msg = 'Error in scoring card "' .. card.name .. '"(guid:' .. card.guid .. ') for ' .. player
                         broadcastToAll(msg, {1,0,0})
                         broadcastToAll(result)
                    end
               end
          end
     end

     return score
end

function logScoreDetails(name, desc, earnedVp, scoreDetails)
     local cardData = getCardData(name, desc)
     if cardData and cardData.tags then
          if cardData.tags['? VP'] then
               table.insert(scoreDetails['? VP'], name .. ': ' .. tostring(earnedVp) .. ' VP')
          elseif cardData.tags['* VP'] then
               table.insert(scoreDetails['* VP'], name .. ': ' .. tostring(earnedVp) .. ' VP')
          elseif type(cardData.VP) == 'number' then
               table.insert(scoreDetails['X VP'], name .. ': ' .. tostring(earnedVp) .. ' VP')
          end
     end
end

function getCardData(name, desc)
     local key = ''
     if desc ~= '' then
          key = name .. ' ' .. desc
     else
          key = name
     end

     return CardLib[key]
end

function scoreCard(player, obj, name, desc, inPlay, inGarrison, inHistory)
     local data = getCardData(name, desc)
     if data == nil or data.VP == nil then
          if DEBUG then
               log(player .. ': No scoring for "' .. key .. '"')
          end
          return 0
     end

     vp = data.VP

     if SoloGame and player == BotColor then
          if data.VP == nil then
               return 0
          elseif type(vp) == 'number' then
               return vp
          elseif data.tags ~= nil then
               if data.tags['* VP'] ~= nil then
                    return 5
               elseif data.tags['? VP'] ~= nil then
                    local value = 0
                    -- check highest value among possible VP values
                    for i=1, #data.params do
                         if data.params[i] ~= nil and data.params[i] > value then
                              value = data.params[i]
                         end
                    end
                    return value
               end
          end

          return 0
     end

     if type(vp) == 'string' and data.params == nil then
          broadcastToAll('Entry "' .. key .. '" is missing params entry in card library', {1,0,0})
          return 0
     end

     if vp == nil then
          return 0
     elseif type(vp) == 'number' then
          return vp
     elseif vp == 'tag' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = 0
          for i=3, #data.params do
               if CountableTags[data.params[i]] ~= nil then
                    count = count + PlayerTagValues[player][data.params[i]]
               else
                    broadcastToAll('Tag "' .. data.params[i] .. '" not registered for scoring on card "' .. name .. '"', {1, 0, 0})
               end
          end

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     elseif vp == 'tag_inplay' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = 0
          for i = 3, #data.params do
               if CountableInPlayTags[data.params[i]] ~= nil then
                    count = count + PlayerInPlayTagValues[player][data.params[i]]
               else
                    broadcastToAll('Tag "' .. data.params[i] .. '" not registered for in-play scoring on card "' .. name .. '"', {1, 0, 0})
               end
          end

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     elseif vp == 'loc' then
          local historyScore = data.params[1]
          local garrisonScore = data.params[2]
          local inPlayScore = data.params[3]
          local otherwiseScore = data.params[4]

          if historyScore ~= nil and inHistory then
               return historyScore
          elseif garrisonScore ~= nil and inGarrison then
               return garrisonScore
          elseif inPlayScore ~= nil and inPlay then
               return inPlayScore
          elseif otherwiseScore ~= nil then
               return otherwiseScore
          end
          return 0
     elseif vp == 'history_count' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = getHistoryCardCount(player)

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     elseif vp == 'exile_count' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = getExileCardCount(player)

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     elseif vp == 'other_unrest_count' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = getOtherUnrestTotal(player)

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     elseif vp == 'fewer_progress' then
          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local count = 0
          local seatedPlayers = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
          for _, playerColor in ipairs(seatedPlayers) do
               if player ~= playerColor and PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Progress < PlayerTagValues[player].Progress then
                    count = count + 1
               end
          end

          return count * vpPer
     elseif vp == 'garrison_count' then
          if inGarrison then
               return 0
          end

          local vpPer = data.params[1]
          local n = data.params[2]
          local count = getGarrisonCount(player, obj)

          return math.min(10, math.floor(count / n) * vpPer)
     end

     broadcastToAll('Failed scoring card "' .. name .. '". Invalid VP type "' .. vp '"', {1, 0, 0})
     return 0
end

-- Concatenates table2 into table1
function concatTable(table1, table2)
     for k, v in pairs(table2) do
          table1[k] = v
     end
end

function getOtherUnrestTotal(player)
     local sum = 0
     local seatedPlayers = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     for _, playerColor in ipairs(seatedPlayers) do
          if player ~= playerColor then
               sum = sum + PlayerTagValues[playerColor].Unrest
          end
     end
     return sum
end

function countCardsInZone(zone)
     local sum = 0
     for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' then
               sum = sum + 1
          elseif obj.type == 'Deck' then
               sum = sum + obj.getQuantity()
          end
     end
     return sum
end

function getHistoryCardCount(player)
     return countCardsInZone(getObjectFromGUID(PlayerRegionsGUID[player].history))
end

function getExileCardCount()
     return countCardsInZone(getObjectFromGUID(ExileZoneGUID))
end

function getGarrisonCount(player, obj)
     if not getIfInPlayZone(player, obj) then
          return 0
     end

     local n = countCardsUnderThis(player, obj, 0)
     return n
end

function countCardsUnderThis(player, obj, n)
     local count = 0

     -- failsafe for inf recursion
     if n > 10 then
          return 0
     end

     if obj.type == 'Card' then
          count = 1
     elseif obj.type == 'Deck' then
          count = obj.getQuantity()
     else
          return 0
     end

     -- Dont count the card itself if at top level
     if n == 0 then
          count = count - 1
     end

     -- Check if there is a card or deck underneath
     local hits = Physics.cast({
     origin        = obj.getPosition(),
     direction     = {0, -1, 0},
     type          = 1,
     max_distance  = 0.25
     })

     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          if hit.hit_object.guid ~= obj.guid then
               count = count + countCardsUnderThis(player, hit.hit_object, n + 1)
               break
          end
     end

     return count
end

function createNationSetupButtons()
     for _, guid in ipairs(NationPowerCardsGUID) do
          getObjectFromGUID(guid).hide_when_face_down = false
          createNationSetupButton(guid)
     end
end

function createNationSetupButton(guid)
  local card = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
  card.clearButtons()

  -- If nation already selected, don't create buttons
  if SelectedNationsGUID["_" .. guid] ~= nil then
    return
  end

  if not card.is_face_down then
      card.createButton({
        click_function = "nationSetupClick",
        function_owner = Global,
        label = "Select",
        position = {0, 0.5, 2},
        width = 1000,
        height = 250,
        font_size = 150,
      })
  else
      card.createButton({
        click_function = "nationSetupClick",
        function_owner = Global,
        label = "Select",
        position = {0, -0.5, 2},
        rotation = {0, 0, 180},
        width = 1000,
        height = 250,
        font_size = 150,
      })
  end
end

function nationSetupClick(obj, playerColor, altClick)
  if Player[playerColor].getHandCount() == 0 then
    broadcastToColor('Please take a seat before you select a nation.', playerColor)
    return
  end

  local cardSet = obj.getVar('CardSet')

  if cardSet == nil then
    broadcastToAll(obj.getName() .. " missing Card set values", {1, 0, 0})
    return
  end

  if SoloGame and SoloSelectForWho == 1 then
    playerColor = BotColor
  end

  -- Return previous selected nation cards if it exists
  if SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID[playerColor] ~= nil then
    local card = getObjectFromGUID(SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID[playerColor])
    local prevCardSet = card.getVar('CardSet')

    for _, v in pairs(prevCardSet) do
      if type(v) == 'table' then
        for _, w in ipairs(v) do
          local cards = getObjectFromGUID(w)
          if cards ~= nil then
              cards.setPositionSmooth(SavedPositionsGUID["_" .. w], false, true)
              cards.setLock(true)
          end
        end
      else
        local cards = getObjectFromGUID(v)
        if cards ~= nil then
            cards.setPositionSmooth(SavedPositionsGUID["_" .. v], false, true)
            cards.setLock(true)
        end
      end
    end

    SelectedNationsGUID["_" .. card.guid] = nil
    createNationSetupButton(prevCardSet.power)
  end

  SelectedNationsByPlayerGUID[playerColor] = obj.getGUID()
  SelectedNationsGUID["_" .. obj.getGUID()] = true

  -- Save positions of the newly selected nation cards
  for _, v in pairs(cardSet) do
    if type(v) == 'table' then
      for _, guid in ipairs(v) do
        local cards = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if cards ~= nil then
            SavedPositionsGUID["_" .. guid] = cards.getPosition()
        end
      end
    else
        local cards = getObjectFromGUID(v)
        if cards ~= nil then
            SavedPositionsGUID["_" .. v] = getObjectFromGUID(v).getPosition()
        end
    end
  end

  -- Move cards into player's region
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 1, cardSet.development)
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 2, cardSet.nation)
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 3, cardSet.supply)
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 4, cardSet.power)
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 5, cardSet.deck)
  moveNationCards(playerColor, 0, cardSet.etc)

  if SoloSelectForWho == nil then
    SoloSelectForWho = 0
  end

  if SoloGame then
    SoloSelectForWho = (SoloSelectForWho + 1) % 2
    if SoloSelectForWho == 1 then
      broadcastToAll("The next nation you select will be for the Bot.", {1, 1, 1})
    end
  end

  obj.clearButtons()
end

function moveNationCards(playerColor, setupPosIndex, guid)
     if guid == nil then
          return
     end

     -- ETC cards
     if setupPosIndex < 1 then
          local pos = PlayerSetupPos[playerColor][4]
          local cards = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
          if cards ~= nil then
               cards.setPositionSmooth({pos[1] - 12, pos[2] + 0.2, pos[3]}, false, true)
               cards.setLock(false)
          end
          return
     end

     if type(guid) == 'table' then
          for i, v in ipairs(guid) do
               local pos = PlayerSetupPos[playerColor][setupPosIndex]
               local cards = getObjectFromGUID(v)
               if cards ~= nil then
                    cards.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + (i - 1) * 0.2, pos[3]}, false, true)
                    cards.setLock(false)
                    if i == 2 then
                         cards.shuffle()
                    end
               end
          end
     else
          local cards = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
          if cards ~= nil then
               local pos = PlayerSetupPos[playerColor][setupPosIndex]
               cards.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.2, pos[3]}, false, true)
               cards.setLock(false)
               if setupPosIndex == 5 then
                    cards.shuffle()
               end
          end
     end
end

function onPlayerTurn(player,  previous_player)
     if player == nil then
          return
     end
     updateScoreUI()
end

function updateScoreUI()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "updateScoreUIco")
end

function updateScoreUIco()
     calculateScore()
     refreshScoreTextUI()
     return 1
end

function refreshScoreTextUI()
     for player, score in pairs(PlayerScores) do
          UI.setAttribute(player .. 'Score', 'text', 'Your score: ' .. tostring(PlayerScores[player]) .. ' VP')
     end
end

function reshuffleRedCo()
     reshuffleZone(Players[1])
     return 1
end

function reshuffleYellowCo()

     return 1
end

function reshuffleGreenCo()
     reshuffleZone(Players[3])
     return 1
end

function reshuffleBlueCo()
     reshuffleZone(Players[4])
     return 1
end

function reshuffleZone(player)
     local pos = PlayerSetupPos[player][5]
     local zone = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerRegionsGUID[player].deck)

     for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' or obj.type == 'Deck' then
               obj.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2], pos[3]}, false, true)
               obj.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 180}, false, true)
          end
     end

     w(0.65)

     for _, obj in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Deck' then
               obj.shuffle()
          end
     end
end

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, enter_object)
     if SoloGame then
          return
     end

     if zone.getGUID() == MarketRowZoneGUID then
          if enter_object.type == 'Card' and enter_object.getName() ~= 'Unrest' and (enter_object.getRotation()[3] < 30 or enter_object.getRotation()[3] > 330) then
               createButtonsOnMarketCard(enter_object)
          elseif enter_object.type == 'Tile' then
               tokenPlacementDisableExile(enter_object)
          end
     end
end

function recreateButtonsOnMarketCards()
     if SoloGame then
          return
     end

     for _, obj in ipairs(getObjectFromGUID(MarketRowZoneGUID).getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.getName() ~= 'Unrest' then
               createButtonsOnMarketCard(obj)
          end
     end
end

function createButtonsOnMarketCard(obj)
     obj.clearButtons()
     obj.createButton({
          click_function = 'acquireClick',
          function_owner = Global,
          width = 1000,
          height = 250,
          position = {0, 0.2, 2},
          label = 'Acquire',
          font_size = 125,
     })

     obj.createButton({
          click_function = 'breakthroughClick',
          function_owner = Global,
          width = 1000,
          height = 250,
          position = {0, 0.2, 2.75},
          label = 'Break Through',
          font_size = 125,
     })

     if not getIfTokensOnMarketCard(obj) then
          enableExileForCard(obj)
     end
end

function onObjectLeaveZone(zone, leave_object)
     if SoloGame then
          return
     end

     if zone.getGUID() == MarketRowZoneGUID then
          if leave_object.type == 'Card' then
               leave_object.clearButtons()
          elseif leave_object.type == 'Tile' then
               recreateButtonsOnMarketCards()
          end
     end
end

function acquireClick(obj, player)
     if RegisteredPlayers[player] then
          TargetPos = obj.getPosition()
          obj.deal(1, player)
          obj.clearButtons()

          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = obj.getPosition(),
               type = 2,
               size = {0.2, 0.2, 0.2},
               direction = {0, -1, 0},
               max_distance = 0.1
          })

          -- grab the unrest if there is one
          for _, other in ipairs(hits) do
               local hitobj = other.hit_object
               if hitobj.type == 'Card' and hitobj.getName() == 'Unrest' then
                    hitobj.deal(1, player)
                    break
               end
          end

          local tally = gainTokensOnMarketCard(obj, player)
          broadcastGetCard(player, 'acquired', obj, tally)
          startLuaCoroutine(self, 'delayReplenishMarketSpotCo')
     end
end

function broadcastGetCard(player, getType, card, tally)
     local str = (Player[player].steam_name or player) .. ' ' .. getType .. ' "' .. card.getName()

     local ignoreComma = true
     local hadResources = false
     local extraStr = ''

     for k,v in pairs(tally) do
          if v > 0 then
               hadResources = true
               if not ignoreComma then
                    extraStr = extraStr .. ', '
               end

               ignoreComma = false
               extraStr = extraStr .. tostring(v) .. ' ' .. k
          end
     end

     if not hadResources then
          str = str .. '."'
     else
          str = str .. '" and gained ' .. extraStr .. '.'
     end

     broadcastToAll(str, Player[player].color)
end

function tokenPlacementDisableExile(token)
     local hits = Physics.cast({
          origin = token.getPosition(),
          direction = {0, -1, 0},
          max_distance = 1
     })

     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          local obj = hit.hit_object
          if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.getName() ~= 'Unrest' then
               disableExileForCard(obj)
          end
     end
end

function disableExileForCard(card)
     local buttons = card.getButtons()
     if #buttons < 3 then
          return
     end
     card.removeButton(2)
end

function enableExileForCard(card)

          height = 250,
          position = {0, 0.2, -2.5},

function getIfTokensOnMarketCard(obj)
     local hits = Physics.cast({
          origin = obj.getPosition(),
          type = 3,
          size = {3,0.1,5},
          max_distance = 0.1,
          direction = {0, 1, 0},
     })

     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          if hit.hit_object.type == 'Tile' then
               return true
          end
     end

     return false
end

function gainTokensOnMarketCard(obj, player)
     local hits = Physics.cast({
          origin = obj.getPosition(),
          type = 3,
          size = {3,0.1,5},
          direction = {0, 1, 0},
     })

     local tally = {
          ['Progress'] = 0,
          ['Population'] = 0,
          ['Materials'] = 0
     }

     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          local hitObj = hit.hit_object
          if hitObj.type == 'Tile' then
               tally[hitObj.getName()] = tally[hitObj.getName()] + gainResourcesForPlayer(player, hitObj)
               hitObj.destroy()
          end
     end

     return tally
end

function gainResourcesForPlayer(player, tile)
     local obj = getObjectFromGUID(PlayerTokensGUID[player][string.lower(tile.getName())])
     if not obj then
          return
     end

     local count = obj.getVar('count')
     local n = tile.getQuantity()
     if n < 0 then
          n = 1
     end
     obj.setVar('count', count + n)
     obj.call('updateDisplay')

     return n
end

function delayReplenishMarketSpotCo()
     local pos = TargetPos
     w(0.3)
     replaceMarketCard(pos)
     return 1
end

function replenishMarketCo()
     for _, pos in ipairs(marketSlotPos) do
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = {pos[1], pos[2] - 1, pos[3]},
               direction = {0, 1, 0},
               max_distance = 1.5,
          })

          local needRefill = true
          for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
               local obj = hit.hit_object
               -- non unrest card at position, continue to next position
               if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.getName() ~= 'Unrest' and obj.resting or obj.type == 'Deck' then
                    needRefill = false
                    break
               end
          end

          if needRefill then
               replaceMarketCard(pos)
               w(0.2)
          end
     end
     return 1
end

function replaceMarketCard(pos)
     -- Make sure spot has no deck from invalid card stacking
     local hits = Physics.cast({
          origin = {pos[1], pos[2] - 1, pos[3]},
          direction = {0, 1, 0},
          max_distance = 1
     })
     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          if hit.hit_object.type == 'Deck' then
               return
          end
     end

     -- First check if deck above card slot. If it exists, draw from that deck. Otherwise draw from main deck.
     local deckToDrawFrom = nil
     hits = Physics.cast({
          origin = {pos[1], pos[2] - 1, pos[3] + 12},
          direction = {0, 1, 0},
     })

     for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
          if hit.hit_object.type == 'Deck' or hit.hit_object.type == 'Card' then
               deckToDrawFrom = hit.hit_object
               break
          end
     end

     if not deckToDrawFrom then
          for _, obj in ipairs(getObjectFromGUID(GeneralDeckZoneGUID).getObjects()) do
               if obj.type == 'Deck' or obj.type == 'Card' then
                    deckToDrawFrom = obj
               end
          end
     end

     if deckToDrawFrom then
          local target = deckToDrawFrom
          local targetInfo = nil
          if target.type == 'Card' then
               targetInfo = getCardData(target.getName(), target.getDescription())
          elseif target.type == 'Deck' then
               local item = target.getObjects()[1]
               targetInfo = getCardData(item.name, item.description)
          end

          hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = {pos[1], pos[2] - 1, pos[3]},
               direction = {0, 1, 0},
               max_distance = 1
          })

          local unrestAtSpot = nil
          for _, hit in ipairs(hits) do
               local item = hit.hit_object
               if item.type == 'Card' and item.getName() == 'Unrest' then
                    unrestAtSpot = item
                    break
               end
          end

          local isRegion = targetInfo and targetInfo.tags['Region'] ~= nil

          -- Place card into the position
          if target.type == 'Deck' then
               local card = target.takeObject()
               card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 1.5, pos[3]}, false)
               card.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false, true)
          elseif target.type == 'Card' then
               target.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 1.5, pos[3]}, false)
               target.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false, true)
          else
               log('Something happened trying to place card into market.')
               return    -- something happened
          end

          -- Place or remove the Unrest depending on type of card being placed
          if isRegion and unrestAtSpot then
               local unrestDeck = getObjectFromGUID(UnrestZoneGUID).getObjects()[1]
               if unrestDeck and unrestDeck.type == 'Deck' then
                    unrestDeck.putObject(unrestAtSpot)
               else
                    unrestAtSpot.setPositionSmooth({19.25, 3, 22.25}, false)
               end
               return
          elseif not isRegion and not unrestAtSpot then
               for _, v in ipairs(getObjectFromGUID(UnrestZoneGUID).getObjects()) do
                    if v.type == 'Deck' then
                         for _, deckCard in ipairs(v.getObjects()) do
                              if deckCard.name == 'Unrest' then
                                   local card = v.takeObject({guid = deckCard.guid})
                                   card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.75, v.getPosition()[3]}, false)
                                   card.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false)
                                   return
                              end
                         end
                    elseif v.type == 'Card' and v.getName() == 'Unrest' then
                         v.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.75, v.getPosition()[3]})
                         v.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false)
                         return
                    end
               end
          end
          -- if not isRegion then
          --      for _, v in ipairs(getObjectFromGUID(UnrestZoneGUID).getObjects()) do
          --           if v.type == 'Deck' then
          --                for _, deckCard in ipairs(v.getObjects()) do
          --                     if deckCard.name == 'Unrest' then
          --                          local card = v.takeObject({guid = deckCard.guid})
          --                          card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.5, v.getPosition()[3]}, false)
          --                          card.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false)
          --                          return
          --                     end
          --                end
          --           elseif v.type == 'Card' and v.getName() == 'Unrest' then
          --                v.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.5, v.getPosition()[3]}, false)
          --                v.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0}, false)
          --                return
          --           end
          --      end
          -- end
     end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
-- Universal Counter Tokens      coded by: MrStump
owner = 'Red'
uiTarget = 'Population'

--Saves the count value into a table (data_to_save) then encodes it into the Tabletop save
function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {saved_count = count}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

--Loads the saved data then creates the buttons
function onload(saved_data)
    generateButtonParamiters()
    --Checks if there is a saved data. If there is, it gets the saved value for 'count'
    if saved_data != '' then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        count = loaded_data.saved_count
    else
        --If there wasn't saved data, the default value is set to 0.
        count = 0
    end

    --Generates the buttons after putting the count value onto the 'display' button
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 720
    else
        b_display.font_size = 1000
    end
    self.createButton(b_display)
    self.createButton(b_plus)
    self.createButton(b_minus)
    UI.setAttribute(owner..uiTarget, 'text', tostring(count))
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 1 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase()
    count = count + 1
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 1 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 0 then
        count = count - 1
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--Activates when + is hit. Adds 5 to 'count' then updates the display button.
function increase5()
    count = count + 5
    updateDisplay()
end

--Activates when - is hit. Subtracts 5 from 'count' then updates the display button.
function decrease5()
    --Prevents count from going below 0
    if count > 4 then
        count = count - 5
    else
        count = 0
    end
    updateDisplay()
end

function customSet()
    local description = self.getDescription()
    if description != '' and type(tonumber(description)) == 'number' then
        self.setDescription('')
        count = tonumber(description)
        updateDisplay()
    end
end

--function that updates the display. I trigger it whenever I change 'count'
function updateDisplay()
    --If statement to resize font size if it gets too long
    if count >= 100 then
        b_display.font_size = 720
    else
        b_display.font_size = 1000
    end
    b_display.label = tostring(count)
    self.editButton(b_display)
    UI.setAttribute(owner..uiTarget, 'text', tostring(count))
end

--This is activated when onload runs. This sets all paramiters for our buttons.
--I do not have to put this all into a function, but I prefer to do it this way.
function generateButtonParamiters()
    b_display = {
        index = 0, click_function = 'customSet', function_owner = self, label = '',
        position = {0,0.1,-3.75}, width = 1000, height = 1000, font_size = 1000
    }
    b_plus = {
        click_function = 'increase', function_owner = self, label =  '+1',
        position = {1.6,0.1,-3.35}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 400
    }
    b_minus = {
        click_function = 'decrease', function_owner = self, label =  '-1',
        position = {-1.6,0.1,-3.35}, width = 600, height = 600, font_size = 400
    }
    b_plus5 = {
        click_function = 'increase5', function_owner = self, label =  '+5',
        position = {0.75,0.1,-0.29}, width = 150, height = 230, font_size = 200
    }
    b_minus5 = {
        click_function = 'decrease5', function_owner = self, label =  '-5',
        position = {-0.75,0.1,-0.29}, width = 150, height = 230, font_size = 200
    }
end

Chinese_Checkers_Piece
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
tableHeightOffset = -9.5

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({tid=tableImageData, cd=checkData})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         tableImageData = loaded_data.tid
         checkData = loaded_data.cd
    else
        tableImageData = {}
        checkData = {move=false, scale=false}
    end

    --Disables interactable status of objects with GUID in list
    for _, guid in ipairs(ref_noninteractable) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj then obj.interactable = false end
    end

    --Establish references to table parts
    obj_leg1 = getObjectFromGUID("d828dc")
    obj_leg2 = getObjectFromGUID("d9de2e")
    obj_leg3 = getObjectFromGUID("5cd6c9")
    obj_leg4 = getObjectFromGUID("351822")
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("9ef9b8")
    obj_side_top = getObjectFromGUID("eb1c39")
    obj_side_bot = getObjectFromGUID("1b8519")
    obj_side_lef = getObjectFromGUID("1c4ac9")
    obj_side_rig = getObjectFromGUID("83a120")

    controlActive = false
    createOpenCloseButton()
end



--Activation/deactivation of control panel



--Activated by clicking on
function click_toggleControl(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        if not controlActive then
            --Activate control panel
            controlActive = true
            self.clearButtons()
            createOpenCloseButton()
            createSurfaceInput()
            createSurfaceButtons()
            createScaleInput()
            createScaleButtons()
        else
            --Deactivate control panel
            controlActive = false
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createOpenCloseButton()

        end
    end
end




--Table surface control



--Changes table surface
function click_applySurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("New Table Image Applied", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Saves table surface
function click_saveSurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local nickname = self.getInputs()[1].value
        local url = self.getInputs()[2].value
        if nickname == "" then
            --No nickname
            broadcastToAll("Please supply a nickname for this save.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
        else
            --Nickname exists

            if findInImageDataIndex(url, nickname) == nil then
                --Save doesn't exist already
                table.insert(tableImageData, {url=url, name=nickname})
                broadcastToAll("Image URL saved to memory.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
                --Refresh buttons
                self.clearButtons()
                createOpenCloseButton()
                createSurfaceButtons()
                createScaleButtons()
            else
                --Save exists already
                broadcastToAll("Memory already contains a save with this Name or URL. Delete it first.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            end
        end
    end
end

--Loads table surface
function click_loadMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        self.editInput({index=0, value=tableImageData[index].name})
        self.editInput({index=1, value=tableImageData[index].url})
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("Table Image Loaded", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Deletes table surface
function click_deleteMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        table.remove(tableImageData, index)
        self.clearButtons()
        createOpenCloseButton()
        createSurfaceButtons()
        createScaleButtons()
        broadcastToAll("Element Removed from Memory", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Updates surface from the values in the input field
function updateSurface()
    local customInfo = obj_surface.getCustomObject()
    customInfo.diffuse = self.getInputs()[2].value
    obj_surface.setCustomObject(customInfo)
    obj_surface = obj_surface.reload()
end



--Table Scale control



--Applies Scale to table pieces
function click_applyScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local newWidth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[3].value)
        local newDepth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[4].value)
        if type(newWidth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Width", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif type(newDepth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Depth", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth<0.1 or newDepth<0.1 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale cannot go below 0.1", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth>12 or newDepth>12 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale should not go over 12 (world size limitation)", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        else
            changeTableScale(math.abs(newWidth), math.abs(newDepth))
            broadcastToAll("Scale applied.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks move box for hands
function click_checkMove(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkMove" end
        if checkData.move == true then
            checkData.move = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.move = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end

--Alters scale of elements and moves them
function changeTableScale(width, depth)
    --Scaling factors used to translate scale to position offset
    local width2pos = (width-1) * 18
    local depth2pos = (depth-1) * 18

    --Hand zone movement
    if checkData.move == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                moveHandZone(Player[pc], width2pos, depth2pos)
            end
        end
    end
    --Hand zone scaling
    --The button to enable this was disabled for technical reasons
    if checkData.scale == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                scaleHandZone(Player[pc], width, depth)
            end
        end
    end

    --Resizing table elements
    obj_side_top.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_bot.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_lef.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_side_rig.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_surface.setScale({width, 1, depth})

    --Moving table elements to accomodate new scale
    obj_side_lef.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_rig.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_top.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_side_bot.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg1.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg2.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg3.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg4.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    self.setPosition(obj_leg4.positionToWorld({-22.12, 8.74,-19.16}))
    --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
    obj_surface.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,0})
end

--Move hand zone, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function moveHandZone(p, width2pos, depth2pos)
    local widthX = obj_side_rig.getPosition().x
    local depthZ = obj_side_top.getPosition().z
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local pos = handT.position
        local y = handT.rotation.y

        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            if pos.z > 0 then
                pos.z = pos.z + depth2pos - depthZ
            else
                pos.z = pos.z - depth2pos + depthZ
            end
        else
            if pos.x > 0 then
                pos.x = pos.x + width2pos - widthX
            else
                pos.x = pos.x - width2pos + widthX
            end
        end

        --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
        --pos.y = tableHeightOffset + 14

        handT.position = pos
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end


---Scales hand zones, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function scaleHandZone(p, width, depth)
    local widthFact = width / obj_side_top.getScale().x
    local depthFact = depth / obj_side_lef.getScale().x
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local scale = handT.scale
        local y = handT.rotation.y
        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            scale.x = scale.x * widthFact
        else
            scale.x = scale.x * depthFact
        end
        handT.scale = scale
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end



--Information gathering



--Checks if a color is promoted or host
function permissionCheck(color)
    if Player[color].host==true or Player[color].promoted==true then
        return true
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Locates a string saved within memory file
function findInImageDataIndex(...)
    for _, str in ipairs({...}) do
        for i, v in ipairs(tableImageData) do
            if v.url == str or v.name == str then
                return i
            end
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

--Locates a button with a helper function
function findButton(obj, func)
    if func==nil then error("No func supplied to findButton") end
    for _, v in ipairs(obj.getButtons()) do
        if func(v) then
            return v
        end
    end
    return nil
end

function createOpenCloseButton()

        color={1,1,1,0}, tooltip=tooltip

end

function createSurfaceInput()
    local currentURL = obj_surface.getCustomObject().diffuse
    local nickname = ""
    if findInImageDataIndex(currentURL) ~= nil then
        nickname = tableImageData[findInImageDataIndex(currentURL)].name
    end
    self.createInput({
        label="Nickname", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,2}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter nickname for table image (only used for save)",
        value=nickname

        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter URL for tabletop image",

end

ObjectStates.Name: CardCustom
go_game_piece_white
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
stateCardGUID = 'fbdfa7'
exhaustGUID = {'08652c', 'a13b94', '8c07fb', '80d47e', 'f6d49e'}
actionGUID = {'9fbce3', 'bf824d', 'e5b130'}

function onLoad()
     self.interactable = false
     self.createButton({
          position = {0, 1, 0},
          click_function = "recallTokens",
          function_owner = self,
          label = "Recall",
          width = 1800,
          height = 500,
          font_size = 400,
          font_color = "White",
          color = Color(0, 0, 0)
      })
end

function recallTokens()
  local stateCard = getObjectFromGUID(stateCardGUID)
  if stateCard == nil then
    return
  end

  local pos = stateCard.getPosition()

  local n = 4
  local wOff = 3
  local offset = wOff / n
  local x = pos[1] - wOff / 2

  for i, v in ipairs(exhaustGUID) do
    local exhaustToken = getObjectFromGUID(v)
    if exhaustToken ~= nil then
      exhaustToken.setPositionSmooth({x + offset * (i - 1), pos[2] + ((i + 1) % 2) * 0.5 + 0.5, pos[3] + 0.8 + ((i + 1) % 2) * -0.8}, false, true)
      exhaustToken.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
    end
  end

  n = 2
  offset = wOff / n
  for i, v in pairs(actionGUID) do
    local actionToken = getObjectFromGUID(v)
    if actionToken ~= nil then
      actionToken.setPositionSmooth({x + offset * (i - 1), pos[2] + 0.5, pos[3] - 1.5}, false, true)
      actionToken.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
    end
  end
end

function getVP(params)

    end

    return -2

ObjectStates.Name: Notecard
ObjectStates.Description:
[u]Scripted Scoring[/u]: Cards left in a player's hand and colored regions will automatically be scored.

The 'Sumerians' card will not remove 2 'Unrest' cards but will pretend they don't exist for scoring purposes.

[u]Bot Scoring[/u]: Place the Bot's deck and discard into the Bot's 'Draw' area before running the script.
